name: @notjustcoders/ioc-arise
description: A CLI tool to generate type-safe IoC containers for TypeScript projects with automatic dependency injection

scripts.test1:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/clean-architecture
scripts.test2:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/circular-deps-modules
scripts.test3:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/circular-deps-classes
scripts.test4:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/minimal-todo
scripts.test5:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/simple-modules
scripts.test6:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/use-cases-example
scripts.test7:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/duplicate-interfaces-example
scripts.test8:generate: npm run build && node dist/index.js generate --source examples/name-collision-example

author: Sid Ali Assoul <assoulsidali@gmail.com>
